name: zkproof-groth16-demo
description: Minimal Groth16 setup for validator delta proof

scripts.powersoftau: mkdir -p build && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 build/pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot12_0000.ptau build/pot12_0001.ptau --name="first contribution" -e="random entropy" && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot12_0001.ptau build/pot12_final.ptau
scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/ValidatorDelta.r1cs build/pot12_final.ptau build/ValidatorDelta_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/ValidatorDelta_0000.zkey build/ValidatorDelta_final.zkey --name="1st Contributor" -e="random entropy" && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/ValidatorDelta_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
scripts.export:verifier: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/ValidatorDelta_final.zkey build/Verifier.sol
